sentences.en: ‘Is that the only way out of here?’ he asked, jerking a thumb at the door.
sentences.cn: “那是这里唯一的出口吗？”他用拇指指了指门口问道。

sentences.en: Don't jerk me around, Mr Crook.
sentences.cn: 别耍我，克鲁克先生。

sentences.en: Doyle jerked at the girl’s hair to make her sit down.
sentences.cn: 多伊尔猛扯那姑娘的头发，让她坐下。

sentences.en: He felt his head jerk reflexively.
sentences.cn: 他感到他的头反射性地动了一下。

sentences.en: He gave a sudden jerk of his head.
sentences.cn: 他突然把头一扭。

sentences.en: He indicated the bedroom with a jerk of his head.
sentences.cn: 他扭头指了指卧室的方向。

sentences.en: He'll come in a jerk.
sentences.cn: 他马上就来.

sentences.en: His remark brought me up short / sharp / with a jerk.
sentences.cn: 他的话我听后一下子楞住了.

sentences.en: I felt the fishing line jerk.
sentences.cn: 我感觉到钓丝猛然一动.

sentences.en: I killed more men than you before I could jerk off.
sentences.cn: 我比你杀死的人更多,多得我都数不清.

sentences.en: I pulled the cord, and I felt a strong jerk.
sentences.cn: 拉住绳索, 我强烈的恐惧.

sentences.en: It was a knee-jerk reaction on her part.
sentences.cn: 这是她未加思索做出的反应。

sentences.en: Just keep that jerk off me.
sentences.cn: 让那个笨蛋离开我.

sentences.en: She jerked open the car door and got out.
sentences.cn: 她猛地打开车门下了车。

sentences.en: The bus stopped with a violent jerk, nearly tipping the box off the seat.
sentences.cn: 公车猛地一颠停了下来, 箱子差一点从座位上滑下来.

sentences.en: The guy is such a jerk! He only cares about himself.
sentences.cn: 这家伙真是个蠢货！他只关心他自己。

sentences.en: The knife was stuck but she pulled it out with a jerk.
sentences.cn: 那把刀子被卡住了,她猛地一拔,把它拔了出来.

sentences.en: The sound of the phone jerked me awake.
sentences.cn: 电话铃声突然把我吵醒了。

sentences.en: The train stopped with a violent jerk , nearly tipping me out of my bunk.
sentences.cn: 火车突然停车, 我差一点从卧铺上摔下来.

sentences.en: There was a jerk as the boat bumped against something.
sentences.cn: 船撞到什么东西，猛颠了一下。

sentences.en: Try not to jerk the camera when taking a photograph.
sentences.cn: 拍照时照相机不要晃.

sentences.en: Wilcox jerked his head to indicate that they should move on.
sentences.cn: 威尔科克斯扭扭头，示意他们该走了。

words.tran_cn: 抽筋的；急动的；不平稳的
小型单缸柱塞泵；海关检查员；肌肉抽搐
肌肉抽搐；性情古怪的人；蠢人；急拉

phrases.tran_cn: (北美，非正式)不诚实（或不公平）地对待（某人）

trans.tran_cn: 突然的拉[推，扭]，<医>（肌肉的）痉挛，抽搐，蠢人，急促而猛烈的动作，猛地一拉

trans.tran_en: to pull something suddenly and roughly

trans.tran_cn: 猛拉，把（牛肉）切成薄片晒干
